catalogQA.description: Creating a high-quality resume to attract employers' attention
Conducting a practice interview to prepare for the real interview
Developing a career development plan to set goals and steps to achieve them
Transitioning to a new professional field for new opportunities and satisfaction
Combating burnout and work overload to maintain energy and emotional well-being
Reiterating the topic of changing careers, possibly as an important consideration

performers.description: Experienced career coach specializing in building strong CVs.
Skilled in rehearsing interviews and helping clients fight burnout.
Expert in building career plans and guiding clients through career changes.
